raw_infobox.name: Allen Iverson
raw_infobox.caption: Iverson with the Detroit Pistons in 2008
raw_infobox.highlights:
* NBA Most Valuable Player Award (2000)
* 11× List of NBA All-Stars (2000 NBA All-Star Game–2010 NBA All-Star Game)
* 2× NBA All-Star Game Most Valuable Player Award (2001 NBA All-Star Game, 2005 NBA All-Star Game)
* 3× All-NBA Team (1998, 2000, 2004)
* 3× All-NBA Team (1999, 2001, 2002)
* All-NBA Team (2005)
* NBA Rookie of the Year Award (1996)
* NBA All-Rookie First Team (1996)
* 4× List of National Basketball Association annual scoring leaders (1998, 2000, 2001, 2004)
* 3× List of National Basketball Association annual steals leaders (2000–2002)
* NBA 75th Anniversary Team
* No. 3 Philadelphia 76ers#Retired numbers
* Consensus first-team NCAA Men's Basketball All-Americans (1996 NCAA Men's Basketball All-Americans)
* First-team List of All-Big East Conference men's basketball teams (1996)
* Second-team All-Big East (1995)
* 2× Big East Conference Men's Basketball Defensive Player of the Year (1995, 1996)
* Big East Conference Men's Basketball Rookie of the Year (1995)
* First-team Parade All-America Boys Basketball Team (1993)
* Virginia Mr. Basketball (1993)
